body: Hello, some of you guys may remember me. I'm Phoenix761218 a person who has been here since early 2012 in mczone, I remember first joining it was my first server, I was so excited I made some awesome friends and we have had memories I will never forget. But after avicus came out a week later I started going inactive, I wanted nothing to do with avicus or mczone anymore. It has been over a year now, and I'm starting to get more active and I want to play again and make more friends. I've seen that the community has grown and a lot of my old time friends have gotten staff ranks. It makes me happy to be back. Thanks for all of the memories avicus, i'm going to make awesome ones again.
